revised_title: Vibration and Strength of Struts and Continuous Beams under End Thrusts: Effect of Vibration and Forced Loading
tldr: The authors investigate the vibration and strength of struts and continuous beams under end thrusts, considering the effects of varying end thrusts, natural periods of vibration, and external forced oscillations. They also analyze the impact of support vibrations and forced loading on spar structures in aerodynamics.
